name: Fast Racing Car Simulator 3D - Winter Race 2017
name_original: Fast Racing Car Simulator 3D - Winter Race 2017
description:
The Winter excitement has begin. If you love winter season and want to feel the spirit of snow in racing games, then you will love this simulation game. Enjoy the winter games through car racing.

Test your driving skills in the 3D Snow game based environment. This fast car racing game is based on a nice winter theme. Your goal in this racing challenge is to speed up your car and beat the opponents car. You can climb the hill by going off road and take shortcuts through the highway hidden tracks to reach the destiny. There is also a time trial mode where you have to drive your car with speed and accuracy within a give time frame to reach to the check points.

You will get the new racing experience with real awesome race tracks. There will be flames and blazing fires that are coming on your way from high lava mountains, don't be afraid of them, accelerate your way through them and keep focus on your driving so that you can get the top speed by moving car fast and become a top racer! Yow will fell

Fast Racing Car games Features:

- Fun and excitement guaranteed
- Enjoy realistic winter graphics
- Awesome 3D Graphics
- Real Physics for car balance
- Simple, easy and intuitive controls
- Fun and excitement guaranteed
- Easy to play racing game for everyone!
